data.title: About Us
data.meta_description: Our mission is to invest in human, natural, and creative potential, serving as thoughtful stewards and catalysts.
data.text:
There is so much potential all around us. We aim to serve as both stewards and catalysts of that potential. As stewards, we nurture and enhance vital community assets. As catalysts, we cultivate and advance the breakthrough ideas that will shape our collective future.

To learn more about Barr's work and our partners, explore our retrospective of the past two years.

Watch the following video where Barr's president and trustee, Jim Canales speaks about the Foundation's mission.

Since September 2017, the board has grown from three members to nine. It is anticipated that the board will continue to include others to share in the governance of the Foundation.

Our board chair’s blog post about the evolution of the Foundation’s governance is available here.

Pictured from left to right: Vanessa Calderón-Rosado, Jim Canales, Mark Edwards, Barbara Hostetter, Amos Hostetter, Sue Tierney, Lee Pelton, Caroline Hostetter Walsh. Not pictured: Tracy Palandjian.
